description.narrative: Employment: The Company''s expansion will increase the availability of direct and indirect jobs in the target countries where it plans to expand. IT services companies are usually the "first job" for many school graduates. The industry is also a source of employment for women as they allow them a job that recognizes their professional capabilities. Development of IT sector: The implementation of this project will promote the development of the IT services sector in South East Asia and in other emerging markets in the long-term fostering competition in the markets where it plans to expand. An investment in Stone Apple will also enhance the competitiveness of these markets as attractive destinations for outsourcing and offshoring. Export/ Economic Growth: Outsourcing/ offshoring generates significant export revenues helping organisations become more efficient and creating local employment thereby contributing to economic growth. Human Capital Development: Stone Apple implements useful training programs for its employees in various technologies. This project will enable the replication of these training programs to new markets where the Company is expanding.

Stone Apple Solutions Pte. Ltd (Stone Apple or the Company) is a pan-Asian information technology (IT) services company founded in Singapore in 2009. The Companys main IT services include consulting and project implementation (installing and configuring of software and/or hardware); managed services (monitoring and maintaining of software, hardware and network); and software application development and testing. The proposed IFC financing to Stone Apple will be used to expand the Companys existing facilities in South East Asia and fund expansion into other emerging countries.
